verses.verse: Now these are the names<WH8034> of the tribes<WH7626>. From the north<WH6828> end<WH7097> to the coast<WH3027> of the way<WH1870> of Hethlon<WH2855>, as one goeth<WH935> to Hamath<WH2574>, Hazar-enan<WH2704>, the border<WH1366> of Damascus<WH1834> northward<WH6828>, to the coast<WH3027> of Hamath<WH2574>; for these are his sides<WH6285> east<WH6921> and west<WH3220>; a<WH259> portion for Dan<WH1835>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Dan<WH1835>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Asher<WH836>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Asher<WH836>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> even unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Naphtali<WH5321>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Naphtali<WH5321>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Manasseh<WH4519>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Ephraim<WH669>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Ephraim<WH669>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> even unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Reuben<WH7205>.
And by the border<WH1366> of Reuben<WH7205>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, a<WH259> portion for Judah<WH3063>.

¶ And by the border<WH1366> of Judah<WH3063>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, shall be the offering<WH8641> which ye shall offer<WH7311> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> reeds in breadth<WH7341>, and in length<WH753> as one<WH259> of the other parts<WH2506>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>: and the sanctuary<WH4720> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of it.

The oblation<WH8641> that ye shall offer<WH7311> unto the LORD<WH3068> shall be of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length<WH753>, and of ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth<WH7341>.

And for them, even for the priests<WH3548>, shall be this holy<WH6944> oblation<WH8641>; toward the north<WH6828> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length, and toward the west<WH3220> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth<WH7341>, and toward the east<WH6921> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth<WH7341>, and toward the south<WH5045> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length<WH753>: and the sanctuary<WH4720> of the LORD<WH3068> shall be in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

It shall be for the priests<WH3548> that are sanctified<WH6942> of the sons<WH1121> of Zadok<WH6659>; which have kept<WH8104> my charge<WH4931>, which went not astray<WH8582> when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went astray<WH8582>, as the Levites<WH3881> went astray<WH8582>.
And this oblation<WH8642> of the land<WH776> that is offered<WH8641> shall be unto them a thing most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> by the border<WH1366> of the Levites<WH3881>.

And over against<WH5980> the border<WH1366> of the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> shall have five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> in length<WH753>, and ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> in breadth<WH7341>: all the length<WH753> shall be five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505>, and the breadth<WH7341> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505>.
And they shall not sell<WH4376> of it, neither exchange<WH4171>, nor alienate<WH5674><WH5674> the firstfruits<WH7225> of the land<WH776>: for it is holy<WH6944> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

¶ And the five<WH2568> thousand<WH505>, that are left<WH3498> in the breadth<WH7341> over against<WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505>, shall be a profane<WH2455> place for the city<WH5892>, for dwelling<WH4186>, and for suburbs<WH4054>: and the city<WH5892> shall be in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

And these shall be the measures<WH4060> thereof; the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>, and the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>, and on the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>, and the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568><WH2568> hundred<WH3967>.

And the suburbs<WH4054> of the city<WH5892> shall be toward the north<WH6828> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>, and toward the south<WH5045> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>, and toward the east<WH6921> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>, and toward the west<WH3220> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>.

And the residue<WH3498> in length<WH753> over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion shall be ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> eastward<WH6921>, and ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> westward<WH3220>: and it shall be over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion; and the increase<WH8393> thereof shall be for food<WH3899> unto them that serve<WH5647> the city<WH5892>.
And they that serve<WH5647> the city<WH5892> shall serve<WH5647> it out of all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>.

All the oblation<WH8641> shall be five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> by five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505>: ye shall offer<WH7311> the holy<WH6944> oblation<WH8641> foursquare<WH7243>, with the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892>.

¶ And the residue<WH3498> shall be for the prince<WH5387>, on the one side and on the other of the holy<WH6944> oblation<WH8641>, and of the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892>, over against<WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> of the oblation<WH8641> toward the east<WH6921> border<WH1366>, and westward<WH3220> over against<WH6440> the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> toward the west<WH3220> border<WH1366>, over against<WH5980> the portions<WH2506> for the prince<WH5387>: and it shall be the holy<WH6944> oblation<WH8641>; and the sanctuary<WH4720> of the house<WH1004> shall be in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

Moreover from the possession<WH272> of the Levites<WH3881>, and from the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892>, being in the midst<WH8432> of that which is the prince's<WH5387>, between the border<WH1366> of Judah<WH3063> and the border<WH1366> of Benjamin<WH1144>, shall be for the prince<WH5387>.
As for the rest<WH3499> of the tribes<WH7626>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, Benjamin<WH1144> shall have a<WH259> portion.
And by the border<WH1366> of Benjamin<WH1144>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, Simeon<WH8095> shall have a<WH259> portion.
And by the border<WH1366> of Simeon<WH8095>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, Issachar<WH3485> a<WH259> portion.
And by the border<WH1366> of Issachar<WH3485>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, Zebulun<WH2074> a<WH259> portion.
And by the border<WH1366> of Zebulun<WH2074>, from the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> unto the west<WH3220> side<WH6285>, Gad<WH1410> a<WH259> portion.

And by the border<WH1366> of Gad<WH1410>, at the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward<WH8486>, the border<WH1366> shall be even from Tamar<WH8559> unto the waters<WH4325> of strife<WH4808><WH4809> in Kadesh<WH6946>, and to the river<WH5158> toward the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220>.

This is the land<WH776> which ye shall divide<WH5307> by lot unto the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> for inheritance<WH5159>, and these are their portions<WH4256>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
¶ And these are the goings out<WH8444> of the city<WH5892> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6285>, four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> measures<WH4060>.

And the gates<WH8179> of the city<WH5892> shall be after the names<WH8034> of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478>: three<WH7969> gates<WH8179> northward<WH6828>; one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Reuben<WH7205>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Judah<WH3063>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Levi<WH3878>.

And at the east<WH6921> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>: and three<WH7969> gates<WH8179>; and one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Joseph<WH3130>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Benjamin<WH1144>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Dan<WH1835>.

And at the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> measures<WH4060>: and three<WH7969> gates<WH8179>; one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Simeon<WH8095>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Issachar<WH3485>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Zebulun<WH2074>.

At the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967>, with their three<WH7969> gates<WH8179>; one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Gad<WH1410>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Asher<WH836>, one<WH259> gate<WH8179> of Naphtali<WH5321>.
It was round about<WH5439> eighteen<WH8083><WH6240> thousand<WH505> measures: and the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> from that day<WH3117> shall be, The LORD is there<WH3074>.
